ALSU KURR

About Me

I love to solve problems and advocate ideas using the power of code & design. I fell in love with coding during a Ladies Learning Code workshop, because I realized I could bring any design idea to life and that was so impactful.

Learning by doing: I am keeping myself busy working on a couple different projects, and currenly I am staying focused on improving my ReactJS and Vue.JS chops.

Eat no kale

Eat no kale

This little project was built out of experience being asked 100 times what vegans actually eat and what one would do if they are craving some non vegan food. The website uses Yummly API to pull up results from its database.

HTML, Sass, API, JavaScript, jQuery
